group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textCenter: You look GREAT! Kira-senpai, don't you think you@could totally fall head over heels for her?!

group_1.textRight: I don't think I'll be doing that, but I agree that it@suits her well.

group_1.textCenter: Absolutely! That settles it: Komachi-senpai's our@lead actor.

group_1.textLeft: Mmm...
By the way, where's this outfit from?

group_1.textCenter: A costume rental store happened to sell me some@of their old stock at a discount!

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.@Are you guys thinking what I'm thinking?

group_1.textRight: Yes. This must be thanks to Kyubey, too...

group_1.narration: The wishes we made when@we each became a Magical Girl...
"I want... to make the excavation of that kofun a reality."
"I want to feel the breath of those people buried in history!"
With her wish, Komachi enacted@the excavation of a kofun she'd discovered.
"To always have enough funding to@film my movies in the future!"

group_1.textLeft: ...In other words, her wish is taking effect right now,@yes?

group_1.textRight: Which means that as long as Mihono is at work@filming a movie...
She'll never run low on funds.

group_1.textLeft: Do you think that would solve the budget problem@on its own? Like, even if we don't film the movie?

group_1.textRight: ...I imagine that the budget would get cut off at the@exact moment we cancelled the project.

group_1.textLeft: Yeesh. We're gonna end up being a 100% film club@at this rate...

group_1.textRight: My, the power of wishes is amazing!

group_1.textLeft: You can say that again.
We only just began prepping, and things have@already kicked into full gear.
And my wish came true right away, so that just@leaves Kira's...

group_1.textRight: ...Well, in my case, it was a wish made for myself@"as a writer"...
...so it inherently can't come true until I publish any@of my work.

group_1.textLeft: Guess so. I'm sure it will, though!
It's basically guaranteed, if ours are any indication.
Uh, Mihono?@Why are you looking at me like that?

group_1.textRight: Oh, nothing. I was just thinking that it'd really help@complete the outfit if you could talk in a more@masculine way, too.
Really inhabit the role of the young man, you know!

group_1.textLeft: We, uh... haven't even started filming, though?
Honestly, I'm not much of a "leading role" sort of@person, anyway.

group_1.textRight: No soul on Earth can turn down the leading role in@the tale that is their life...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303802:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Woah, uh, Kira? Is THAT the sort of conversation@we're having right now?

group_1.textRight: To effectively play a role, it's important to inhabit@that role at all times!
As this film's director, I intend to provide you with@the most pointed of acting instruction!

group_1.textLeft: Uuuurgh...

group_1.textRight: Your face says you're not exactly thrilled at the@thought of Mihono bossing you around.

group_1.textLeft: Yup.

group_1.textRight: (Did she just get an idea?)

group_1.textLeft: ...Mihono.

group_1.textRight: Yes?

group_1.textLeft: In exchange for performing one of the lead roles,@may I make a request of my own?

group_1.textRight: Of course! Just say the word.
Anything to provide a comfortable acting@environment for our upcoming star!

group_1.textLeft: Alright. Then if you don't mind, I'd like to be the one@to cast our heroine.

group_1.textRight: Oh, do you? Very well!
In that case, would you like to accompany me as we@scout out our potential cast memb...

group_1.textLeft: Nope, don't worry. I've already got someone in mind.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Our heroine will be played...@by you, Mihono.
